name: Little Urchin Boi
description:
The story of a little urchin that could.  Platform your way through dangerous rooms, using your innards to grapple hook your way to victory using left click.  Fend off dangerous crabs and clams alike using picked up rocks, certain enemies and enemy projectiles. You will find special card abilities to help aid in your adventure.  Complete specific tasks to earn special endings. Keep an eye out for hidden hats, they may be hidden where you least expect them (Hint: walk into some walls, you may find something :).

--------------------------INFO--------------------------

CONTROLS:

Use the mouse button to click where you want to grapple to. Picking up rocks can allow you to fire them back to defeat opponents! There are two enemies you can grapple, the ceiling spiky and the group of plankton. Try grabbing all sorts and see what happens!

To play extract the zip folder and play the "Little Urchin Boi.exe" file.

[The green "cursor" allows you to see where the grapple hook you will take you. Red means you are out of range.]
